definition: lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: And we are at the zero lower bound right now, for the first time in 70 years.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们就处于下界为0的状态，70年中的第一次。

sentences.english: There is no difference, here below, at least, in predestination.
sentences.chinese: 在前定的命运里毫无区别，至少在下界是这样的。

sentences.english: The heavens change every moment, and reflect their glory or gloom on the plains beneath.
sentences.chinese: 天空变幻无穷，映呈着下界的盛衰枯荣。

sentences.english: Therefore, considerable attention is given to the lower bounds on the maximum genus of graphs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，最大亏格的下界的问题引起了人们的广泛关注。

sentences.english: A fox family Nuwa was sent to lower the patron saint of stone.
sentences.chinese: 女娲座下灵狐族则被派遣下界守护神石。

sentences.english: Below the muscular diaphragm, which separates the chest cavity from the abdominal cavity, the esophagus joins the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 在分隔胸腔和腹腔的肌质横膈的下界，食道和胃连接。

sentences.english: Based on the results, we calculate a upper bound or a lower bound of the Hausdorff dimension of some self-affine sets.
sentences.chinese: 利用它们可方便地求出某些自仿集维数的上界或下界。

sentences.english: An almost lower bound is defined similarly as an almost upper bound.
sentences.chinese: 殆下界的定义与殆上界是类似的。

definition: Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to descend to the world (of immortals)
to greet and usher in (guests, newcomers etc)/(Buddhism) to receive into the Pure Land
